alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Johnson; Morgan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Morgan, northern Johnson and Elliott Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 546 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Little Sandy, or near Sandy Hook, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sandy Hook and Crockett around 550 PM EDT. Newfoundland around 555 PM EDT. Isonville around 600 PM EDT. Culver and Keaton around 605 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
